author: China Insights
description:
An exclusive interview at Seoul with Mr. Min Kyun-Wook, a former South Korea Congressman.  Mr. Hwang highlighted the gridlock situation of Korean politics, between pro-impeachment and anti-impeachment for President Yoon. He also mentioned that CCP direct interference in Korean’s political election and emphasized that for South Korean people it is natural to distinguish CCP vs Chinese people.  He praised the value of Shen Yun and hope South Korea government will have legislation to deal with CCP Organ Harvesting Crime. 


Our videos are hosted by real people with real China experience and access to real insights happening in China today. No bots here!

title: Exclusive: Ex-Congressman Min Kyun-Wook on Impeachment, CCP Interference & Organ Harvesting Crimes
